short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create rapid Selenium automated tests with browsers using CloudTestSoftware recorder and CTestOne platform for any site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this recorder to record test script to automate browser testing with CloudTestSoftware. CloudTestSoftware uses Selenium Webdriver to run this script and download sample project  from github using below link https://github.com/cloudtestsoftware/CTestOne
